response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I'm confident it could bring substantial benefits to you, estimated at $8,000 based on your needs. Considering its intrinsic worth and the unique features tailored to meet your specific requirements, I kindly propose a transaction price of $10,000. This offer aims to provide a fair compromise, ensuring both parties are satisfied with the deal. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 10000}
